analysis.description:
MultiCappedCrowdsale.validPurchase (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#471-476) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- Crowdsale.endTime
	- MultiCappedCrowdsale.hardCapTime

MultiCappedCrowdsale.checkHardCap (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#495-498) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- hardCapTime == 0 && totalRaised > hardCap

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#338-352) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#350-351)

MyFinalizableCrowdsale.generateFinalTokens (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#431-439) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(tokenWallet,finalValue) (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#437-438)

FlypCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#635-664) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#660)

FlypCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol)

FlypCrowdsale.pregenTokens (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#621-633) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokenAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#629-630)

MultiCappedCrowdsale.checkHardCap (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#495-498) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- hardCapTime == 0 && totalRaised > hardCap (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#496-498)

FlypCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#635-664) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < presaleEndTime (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#642-651)
ERC20.allowance (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#85-86) should be declared external
StandardToken.allowance (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#150-152) should be declared external
ERC20.approve (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#88-91) should be declared external
StandardToken.approve (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#136-142) should be declared external
StandardToken.increaseApproval (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#158-166) should be declared external
StandardToken.decreaseApproval (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#166-180) should be declared external
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#221-223) should be declared external
MintableToken.mint (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#249-264) should be declared external
Crowdsale.fallback (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#333-336) should be declared external
FinalizableCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#396-403) should be declared external
FlypCrowdsale.withdraw (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.15 (/unique_contracts/0x06dafc2a5fe47fcc9f37b5f91c0c2bd1cf2a9a4c.sol#1): it allows old versions
